name: Email validation with filters
description:
Validates any email, including filters (ie. test+filter@domain.com) and domains with any number of subdomains (ie. @sub.domain.co.uk).
Group 1 is the username, group 2 is the filter if any and group 3 is the domain.
content:
00bunny.hax+filter@toblerone.nk.co
freaky.person.rox2@fad.net
lep@sudo.io
brax+filter@toble.com
